data.eml:eml: A new species of Aciconula (Amphipoda, Senticauda, Caprellidae) from Sultan Iskandar Marine Park, Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lim, Jacqueline H. C., Azman, B. Abdul Rahim, Othman, B. H. Ross (2019): A new species of Aciconula (Amphipoda, Senticauda, Caprellidae) from Sultan Iskandar Marine Park, Malaysia. ZooKeys 859: 17-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.859.33284, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.859.33284
